FuncDef:
The dcn-auto-negotiation disable command disables DCN auto-negotiation on a FlexE physical interface.
The undo dcn-auto-negotiation disable command enables DCN auto-negotiation on a FlexE physical interface.
By default, DCN auto-negotiation is enabled on FlexE physical interfaces.
Examples: Enter system view, return user view with return command.
Enter system view, return user view with return command.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before running the force-physical-mode ethernet command to forcibly switch the underlying working mode of a FlexE physical interface, run the dcn-auto-negotiation disable command to disable DCN auto-negotiation.If the underlying working mode of a FlexE physical interface has been automatically adaptive to Ethernet, run the dcn-auto-negotiation disable command to quickly switch the underlying mode back to FlexE.
